page.title: 15HOME LIFE A SENIOR CITIZEN
page.content: My day begins at 7.10 a.m. when I get up and shower.I then have a cup of tea before clearing out my coal fire.I then get a breakfast comprising of cereal and toast.I make sandwiches for my husband's lunch and prepare the evening meal which I put in the oven and set the automatic timer.I leave the house at 9.00 a.m. to travel to my daughter's house in Llanfoist,some 2 miles away.I help her in her General Stores.At 4.00 p.m. my husband picks me up in the car and we return to our home for the main meal of the day.My evenings vary greatly as I am a member of the Royal British Legion,Mother's Union and Womens Institute.We go to bed at about 11.30 p.m. with a cup of coffee and a book to read.
